title: Four Barrel Coffee French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 29 grams of coffee to medium consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 29g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 464g hot water evenly over grounds
Stir gently with bamboo spoon to create even extraction
brewing_steps.short_instruction: Stir with bamboo spoon • Even extraction

brewing_steps.instruction: Place lid on top, do not press plunger
Press plunger down slowly, pour immediately

notes: Four Barrel Coffee's French Press method focuses on precision and quality. The medium grind and precise timing create a bright, clean cup while maintaining the characteristic body. Perfect for showcasing their carefully sourced beans.
